00005 #include "armversion.h"
00006 #include "aal_adc.h"

00015 void ADC_InitChannel(int channel){
00016         switch (channel){
00017         case 0 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 22; break;
00018         case 1 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 24; break;
00019         case 2 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 26; break;
00020         case 3 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 28; break;
00021         case 4 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 18; break;
00022         case 5 : PINSEL1 |= 1 << 20; break;
00023         }
00024 }
00025 
00035 int ADC_Read(int channel){
00036         AD0CR &= 0x00000000;                                                    //Reset 
00037         AD0CR |= 1 << channel;                          //Select Analog, 0.0 ~ 0.5
00038         AD0CR |= (1<<9);                                                                //Set CLKDIV = 0x00000010
00039         AD0CR |= (1<<21);                                                               //Set AD convertor into operational
00040         AD0CR |= (1<<24);                                                               //Start the convetor
00041         while ((AD0GDR & 0x80000000) != 0x80000000);    //Wait until the A/D conversion is completed
00042         return ((AD0GDR & 0xFFC0) >> 6 );                               //Return the Sensor Reading Value
00043 }
